akn:section.akn:heading: Acts not required to be disclosed.

akn:content.akn:p: An occupant of real property, at any time, was infected or was or is suspected to have been infected with a human immune deficiency virus;

An occupant of real property, at any time, has been diagnosed, was infected, or was suspected to have been diagnosed as having acquired immune deficiency syndrome or any other disease that has been determined by medical evidence to be highly unlikely to be transmitted through occupancy of property alone; or
The property, at any time, has been or was suspected to have been the site of a suicide, homicide, or other felony.
